Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

Sonata in B-flat major, KV Anh. 136/498a

? · KV1,2 Anh. 136 · KV3 498a · KV6 Anh. C 25.04 (mov. 1), Anh. B to 450 (mov. 2), Anh. C 25.05 (mov. 3), Anh. B to 450+456+595 (mov. 4)

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 20'

  • 1. Allegro
  • 2. Andante
  • 3. Menuetto: Allegretto
  • 4. Rondo: Allegro

This sonata is probably spurious.

Recommended editions

  • Neue Mozart-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · X/29/2 · BA 4612-01 · Werke zweifelhafter Echtheit / Band 2: Bläser-Divertimenti, Klavier-Violinsonaten, Klaviermusik · ed. Franz Giegling / Wolfgang Plath / Wolfgang Rehm
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50230 · Klavierstücke / Band 2: Spätere Werke · ed. Ulrich Leisinger [movs. 1 and 3]

1. Allegro

Duration: 6' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5

2. Andante

This is a simplified arrangement of the slow movement of the piano concerto in B-flat major (KV 450).

Duration: 5'

Difficulty: 2

3. Menuetto: Allegretto

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 2.5

4. Rondo: Allegro

This is a simplified arrangement of the final movements of three piano concerti in B-flat major (KV 450, 456 and 595).

Duration: 5' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5
